$:/plugins/tg/exploration/button.text: \define explore-button(class) <$button tooltip="Explore in new window" class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration" height="700px" width="500px"/> {{$:/plugins/tg/exploration/icon}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="explore"/> \end <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration]]" emptyMessage=<>> <>
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/button.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/button
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/button.caption: {{$:/plugins/tg/exploration/icon}} explore

$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration.text:
!!!Exploration
<<<
''Note:''

While working in a new window (in contrast to a standard tiddler):

* The dropdown menu for filter selecting stays open and can only be closed by clicking the {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} button
* Buttons are not rendered correctly in this window!
<<<

<<tabs "[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/xcode]] [[$:/plugins/tg/exploration/help]]" "" "$:/state/tab/exploration" "">>
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto.text:
Default the list of filters contains:

# Buttons (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui/Buttons]]`)
# Code snippets (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/snippets]]`)
# Configuration tiddlers (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/config]]`)
# Core images (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/images]]`)
# Core macros (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/macros]]`)
# Editor toolbar buttons (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar]]`)
# Plugins (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/plugins]]`)
# Shadow ui tiddlers (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui]]`)
# Templates (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/templates]]`)
# Themes (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/themes]]`)
# Widgets (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/modules/widgets]]`)

To add a filter to the list:

* Create a tiddler tagged with `$:/tags/codeFilter`
* Add a field `description` which contains the name of the filter to be seen in the list
* Add a field `filter` which contains the filter you want to add to the list
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/exploration/help.text:
!! Help
* To explore ~WikiText core tiddlers like the UI shadow tiddlers, code snippets, macros, themes and so on, select a filter and then the appropriate tiddler from the list
* The five 'Code' tabs can contain/remember earlier results.
* You can choose a filter from the list or add a filter manually
** Default the list of filters contains <$count filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/codeFilter]]"/> filters but you can add your own filters to the list, see [[How to add a filter to the list|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto]]
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/help.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/help
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/help.caption: Help

$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/codefil.text:
\define codefilter(filter, state) <$select tiddler='$:/state/$state$/list'> <$list filter="$filter$"> ''Tiddler:'' <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}> <$link to={{$:/state/$state$/list}}> <$view field="title"/> ''Source code:'' 
<$view field="text"/>
''Renders as:'' <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}> <$transclude mode='block'/>
''Fields:'' <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TiddlerFields"/> \end ``` \define codefilter(filter, state) <$select tiddler='$:/state/$state$/list'> <$list filter="$filter$"> ''Tiddler:'' <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}> <$link to={{$:/state/$state$/list}}> <$view field="title"/> ''Source code:'' 
<$view field="text"/>
''Renders as:'' <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}> <$transclude mode='block'/>
''Fields:'' <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TiddlerFields"/> \end ```
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/codefil.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/codefilter
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/codefil.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/selectf.text:
\define selectfilter(filter) <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/filter/$filter$"> ''Select via a filter expression''
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/filter/$filter$" type="search" tag="input"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state="$:/temp/filter/$filter$" type="nomatch" text=""> <$link to="" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/codeFilter]]"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field="description"/>
''Select tiddler'' \end ``` \define selectfilter(filter) <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/filter/$filter$"> ''Select via a filter expression''
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/filter/$filter$" type="search" tag="input"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state="$:/temp/filter/$filter$" type="nomatch" text=""> <$link to="" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/codeFilter]]"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field="description"/>
''Select tiddler'' \end ```
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/selectf.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/selectfilter
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/selectf.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/exploration/readme.text:
It is always good to have a look at the code/~WikiText TW uses in the core tiddlers and learn from it.
With this plugin you can explore code/~WikiText core tiddlers like the UI shadow tiddlers, code snippets, macros, themes and so on.
$:/plugins/tg/exploration/readme.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration/readme
